title: Update of dcppA-hindcast dataset for CMCC-CM2-SR5
description:
An error was discovered (wrong external forcings used) in some members and start-dates of the CMCC-CM2-SR5 decadal hindcast data set, namely dcppA-hindcast. After a thorough check, all the affected simulations were repeated with correct forcings and the new data will be uploaded by superseding the version 20201211 of dcppA-hindcast.
Here only four example data file identifiers are provided, one per variable (pr, psl, tas, tos). However, all data files have been updated (all 60 start-dates and 6 members).
